title: Create FO-03 swipe-phase component with updated messaging
description:
Create the swipe phase component for FO-03 with updated messaging.

File to create:
- app/fo-03/components/swipe-phase.tsx

Copy from app/fo-02/components/swipe-phase.tsx and update:

First affirmation intro message:
'Save this affirmation if it feels right - or discard it if it does not. You are forming your personal list now.'

After first action feedback:
'Keep going {name} - every time you like or dislike an affirmation we prepare even better affirmations for you.'

Swipe mechanics (same as FO-02):
- Swipe down/right to save (approve)
- Swipe up/left to discard (skip)
- Keyboard support: Arrow keys
- Framer Motion drag gestures
- Toast messages on swipe

Wire up to generateAffirmationBatchFO03 action.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'forming your personal list' app/fo-03/components/swipe-phase.tsx returns the file
closed_reason: Refined swipe-phase.tsx: changed prop from isFirstAction to hasSwipedOnce for clearer semantics, made the contextual message persistent (intro before swipe, feedback after), removed temporary feedback animation in favor of static message display
